'''Ebert''' is a researcher in the [[Sumeru Akademiya]]'s [[Vahumana|Vahumana Darshan]].

==Profile==
Ebert is mentioned in a recently published book about [[Fontaine|Fontanian]] films and filmmaking technologies, having reviewed and rated the films covered in the book.<ref>Interactable: [[Tanit Camps#Interactables|Advanced Visual Technologies: Fontaine Cinema Edition]]</ref>

==Trivia==
* Ebert is a reference to American film critic {{w|Roger Ebert}}.
